EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: The horse ran to the barn.
The horse jumped over the fence.
There jumped out of the box a little white rabbit.
There jumped a little white rabbit out of the box.
Out of the box jumped a little white rabbit.

DESCRIPTION.secondary: NP-PP; Induced Action with accompanied motion, path-PP

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: Tom jumped the horse over the fence.

DESCRIPTION.secondary: NP-PP; Induced Action without accompanied motion, path-PP

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: The lion tamer jumped the lions through the loop.

DESCRIPTION.secondary: NP; Induced Action with accompanied motion
NP; Induced Action without accompanied motion

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: The lion tamer jumped the lions.
Tom walked the dog to exhaustion.
